description: This notification is sent when cipher type of corresponding service
template is changed.
Represents the ESS. As per CLI, the value of
service policy name will be SSID.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-DOT11-CFG-MIB::hpnicfDot11SSIDName

description: The WLAN system support the following cipher type for data frame
encryption.
tkip(4)
aesccmp(16)
wpisms4(64)
For each service policy, it could support multiple cipher types at
the same time. So the value of object could combine multiple value
of cipher type above.
When the value of node equals to zero, it means no configuration or
undo operation.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-DOT11-CFG-MIB::hpnicfDot11SecurityCiphers

description: This notification is sent when pre-shared key of corresponding
service template is changed.

event.Summary: Pre-shared key of service template is changed

description: Represents the ESS. As per CLI, the value of
service policy name will be SSID.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-DOT11-CFG-MIB::hpnicfDot11SSIDName

description: This notification will be sent when the same wep ID is configured
on two service policies.

event.Summary: Wep ID conflict on two service policies

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HPN-ICF-DOT11-CFG-MIB::hpnicfDot11SSIDWepIDConflictTrap HPN-ICF-DOT11-CFG-MIB::hpnicfDot11PreConflictTemplateNum i 1 HPN-ICF-DOT11-CFG-MIB::hpnicfDot11CurrConflictTemplateNum i 1 HPN-ICF-DOT11-CFG-MIB::hpnicfDot11ConflictCipherIdx i 1 HPN-ICF-DOT11-CFG-MIB::hpnicfDot11ConfigureAPID s EXAMPLE HPN-ICF-DOT11-CFG-MIB::hpnicfDot11ConfigureRadioID i 9999 HPN-ICF-DOT11-CFG-MIB::hpnicfDot11ConfigureAPMacAddress s EXAMPL

description: Represents previous service policy ID when radio bind service policy
and current service policy conflict with previous service policy
in cipher configuration.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-DOT11-CFG-MIB::hpnicfDot11PreConflictTemplateNum

description: Represents current service policy ID when radio bind service policy
and current service policy conflict with previous service policy
in cipher configuration.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-DOT11-CFG-MIB::hpnicfDot11CurrConflictTemplateNum

description: Represents wep ID that conflicted with.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-DOT11-CFG-MIB::hpnicfDot11ConflictCipherIdx

description: Represents which AP is configured.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-DOT11-CFG-MIB::hpnicfDot11ConfigureAPID

description: Represents which radio in AP is configured.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-DOT11-CFG-MIB::hpnicfDot11ConfigureRadioID

description: Represents MAC Address of AP.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-DOT11-CFG-MIB::hpnicfDot11ConfigureAPMacAddress
